nodes.text: The regent's quarters of the Pijali monarchy were located in the Pijali palace on the Inner Rim planet Pijal. In the Republic Era, the quarters were occupied by Lord Regent Rael Averross for the duration of his extended mission there. Though originally beautifully appointed, most parts of the quarters had been altered by Averross to be less extravagant by around 40 BBY. That year, Averross spent the night in his quarters with Selbie, a local hostess that he had a relationship with.
The regent's quarters first appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
